header_text: You are giving a presentation to your coworkers about a new training plan. You feel that your hands are shaking a little. Wondering if it is obvious, you look around and see that a few people have noticed.

elements.text: You realize your coworkers are more interested in your presentation than your hands. You continue your presentation, and as time passes, you discover that your nerves are...
